name: gmUSD
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en:
What is the project about?
gmUSD is an algorithmic stablecoin fully backed by gDAI and gmdUSDC.
The supply of gmUSD can be managed by the protocol minting and redeeming as a part of the Protocol Smart Arbitrage Leverage Mechanism (PSALM).
Backed by yield-bearing assets, gmUSD is also a yield-bearing stablecoin, appreciating in value at an average rate of 15–25% annually.

What makes your project unique?
Yield-Bearing Mechanism
The Protocol Smart Arbitrage Leveraging Mechanism (PSALM)
Incentivization
Black Hole Liquidity

History of your project.

What’s next for your project?

What can your token be used for?
